name: Kartikey Rawat
bio: Associate Open Source Liaison at CodeDay | TFUG Durg Organizer | SIG & WG Member of TensorFlow.js

name: Niket Jain
bio: Niket is a professional Android developer, with deep interest in Mobile Development and UX. Actively contributing to the GDG Bhilai and GDG Raipur community by conducting various workshops and technical talks. Also have keen interest in Game Development and Backend development. Apart from technical work, he love to spent some time playing video games, Chess and Snooker.

name: Sanskriti Harmukh
bio: Spreading Code and Cloud with a side of witty advocacy!

name: Mohd. Toukir Khan
bio: A Senior at SSTC, Bhilai. I am a member at Mozilla Durg and a GitHub Campus Expert. My interests are inclined towards Community Management. I have been contributing to communities since 2022 and I would love to continue my strides to bring in more for the community. I am also a Postman Student Leader and Beta Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador.

name: Dewansh Thakur
bio: I'M A WEB DEVELOPER & OPEN SOURCE CONTRIBUTOR WITH A PASSION FOR CREATING INNOVATIVE PRODUCTS. WITH OVER 4 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE, I'VE CONTRIBUTED TO PROJECTS LIKE PROCESSING FOUNDATION.

name: Isha Dewangan
bio: Isha is a grad student persuing computer science, her curiosity regarding tech, food and culture makes her learn new things. She is also a passionate tech content writer and blogger and loves to explore on various subjects regarding tech and tech related news. She is also involved in communities and enjoys doing community work and engaging with fellow tech-savvys. Her major passion in development is with web developement and generative AI. She's still a learner but very enthusiastic about technology and communities. Also she is a super weeb and love to indulge her time watching anime(and also crime thrillers)in her peace hours.

name: Harsh Vardhan
bio: Am a tech geek passionate about technology and interested in android development

name: Rishita R Nair
bio: I'm Rishita R Nair, a member of GDG Bhilai. I'm passionate about technology and tech communities, and enjoy app development using Android Studio and Flutter. When I'm not coding, I'm exploring my interests, which include listening to podcasts, dancing, and learning new skills.

name: Shubham Prasad
bio: Hey, This is Shubham Prasad. I am currently involved in GDG Bhilai as a UI/UX Designer, I like getting inspiration from different UX Perspectives and love to talk about that. Apart from that I practice Web Development in MERN Stack. Also, I possess a strong connection towards our community. Also, I like Sci-fi and Documentary movies and digital art and love to chat about it.

name: Rishabh Singh
bio: I'm Rishabh Singh, a third-year student studying Computer Science Engineering. I'm passionate about developing apps with Flutter. I'm a Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador, where I help fellow students learn about Microsoft technologies through events and presentations. I'm also a Google Cloud Certified Digital Leader and a Postman Student Expert. I contribute as an influencer at Google Crowdsource, where I work on various projects. I love networking with professionals and tech enthusiasts to keep up with the ever-changing tech world. In my free time, I explore new tech developments and enjoy sharing my knowledge with others. I'm excited about learning and collaborating more in the future.

name: Sitanshu Lall
bio: Passionate and driven third-year engineering student with a strong interest in problem-solving and web development. Currently honing my skills in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) by actively solving coding challenges on various platforms. Eager to explore the world of web development and currently focused on learning ReactJS to build dynamic and user-friendly applications. Seeking opportunities to apply my technical knowledge and contribute to meaningful projects.

name: Akshat Sahu
bio: Hello! I'm Akshat, a final year Computer Science Engineering student with a passion for graphic design and UI/UX. I've embarked on a journey to learn backend programming. Apart from coding and design, I also enjoy video editing and creative direction. I love bringing stories to life through visual narratives and crafting unique, compelling content. I'm always eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges

name: Aditi Sharma
bio: I am a third year CS undergrad at Bhilai Institute of Technology, Durg. I am a web developer enthusiast proficient in MERN Stack. I love exploring different technologies and you will often find me connecting with like minded individuals in our vibrant tech community.

name: Maharshi Sinha
bio: I am a pre-final year pursuing a B.Tech in Electronics & Telecommunication, possessing a strong sense of community and an ardent passion for Flutter, web development, and hackathons. My belief in technology's ability to foster connections and promote inclusivity has led me to participate actively in several tech communities.

name: Aditya Narayan Tiwari
bio: Creative Web Developer and Graphic Designer.

name: Shahil Sinha
bio: I'm Shahil Sinha, Co-Founder of DevBridge and currently serving as the Public Relations Lead at GDSC SSTC. My passion lies in graphic design and video editing, where I enjoy bringing ideas to life through creative visuals and compelling narratives. With a knack for building strong connections, I excel in public relations, leveraging design to communicate effectively and engage audiences on a deeper level.

name: Shalini Pareek
bio: As a B. Tech CSE (AI) student, I have a strong foundation in various programming languages, including Python, C, C++, JavaScript, and R. My current focus is on web development projects, where I am actively applying my technical skills to create valuable solutions. I am dedicated to further expanding my knowledge in technology and languages to excel in my field.

name: Siddharth Raj
bio: I'm a versatile professional with a passion for technology. As a skilled web developer, editor, and UI/UX designer, I bring creativity and functionality to the digital world. With a deep knowledge of technology, I'm dedicated to creating seamless, user-friendly experiences and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the digital realm.

name: Tulika Lunkad
bio: I am a student at Bhilai Institute Of Technology, Durg and a tech enthusiast. Right now learning about web development and loves to contribute, has good writing skills. Also to do research and know more about tech, doing some project works and also learning new coding languages. Right now working as a Volunteer at DevFest 2023 Bhilai (GDG) and contributing as a content writer. As of now having the first experience nourishing skills more and more and contribute towards many such works in future. As her favourite passtime she loves to read books and is fond of drawing. Also the best leisure time according to her is travelling and exploring the world around.

name: Aaisha Khan
bio: Ni hao (Hello)! I'm a passionate biotechnologist and data science enthusiast who has a deep appreciation for patterns and designs. I'm always ready to learn new things and expand my horizons. Beyond my scientific interests, I love to engage with the diverse psychology of people and understand the intricacies of human behavior. As a nature lover, I find solace in the beauty of the natural world. Additionally, I have a keen interest in learning new languages, allowing me to connect with people from different cultures and perspectives. I'm on a continuous journey of growth and discovery, where science, nature, and the complexities of human experience intersect.Xie Xie!!

name: Shubham Ku.Khilari
bio: Shubham, a freelance designer known for his work's commitment to simplicity and clarity, creates mesmerising yet straightforward posters. He's also an ML enthusiast selected for the Amazon ML Summer School and is actively enhancing his front-end development skills. Shubham's diverse talents and dedication make him a dynamic professional ready to excel in design and development.

name: Tanu Shree
bio: My passion majorly lies in Video Editing. Apart from this I also like to participate in sport activities like Cricket and Badminton. I possess a strong passion for technology and thrive on the opportunity to delve into its intricacies, continually seeking opportunities to explore and expand my knowledge in this dynamic field. My tech skills mainly include initials of Frontend Development and Designing stuff.

name: Raj Bhardwaj
bio: I'm Raj Bhardwaj, a second-year Computer Science and Engineering student at Rungta College Of Engineering and Technology. With two internships under my belt and roles as a Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador, Tech Lead at GDSC, and Postman Student Expert, I'm passionate about technology. I specialize in backend development, and I've been crafting industry-standard back-end solutions for over a year. I'm also proud to have won Hackathons at top IITs. Beyond coding, I'm a chess enthusiast and enjoy the art of cinematography. Let's explore the tech world together!
